creator: Powers, John Weston, 1852-1905. (author)
description: Powers, John Weston: 1852-1905. Irish; lived in the Temperance Colony at Saskatoon where he was justice of the peace, schoolmaster, and for a time publisher of a manuscript newspaper, 1884-1885; moved to Regina to engage in journalism; territorial civil clerk in charge of the library, 1889-1891; moved to San Francisco about 1891 (Saskatchewan Archives, Second annual report; Saskatchewan Archives, Scott papers). // Includes advertising on last 26 pages.
